name: Starcheap 2019
description:
Graduation Video Game 
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

With friends on a collapsing platform, you only have a few minutes left to escape! Cooperate to gather the resources you need to build the ship that could save you. But be careful! Every move you make has its weight!

Platform : PC + 4 controllers
Engine : Unity 3D
Number of player : 4
Genre : Party Game

Producer : Meriem-Lina Ghomari
Game Art : Magali Chardon, Kim Ngouansavanh
Game Programming : Antonin Asche, Clément Lartot
Music & Sound Design : Benjamin Thomas, Paul Walline
